dom_info.title: Bombas. Socks, Underwear, T-Shirts, Slippers designed for comfort, quality, and impact

issues.title: Slow Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) on Desktop
issues.description: The Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) for the desktop homepage is 4984ms, which is significantly slower than the recommended threshold of 2500ms. This indicates a poor loading experience for the main content, potentially leading to user frustration and higher bounce rates.
issues.recommendation: Identify and optimize the largest content element. Focus on reducing initial server response time (TTFB), optimizing resource load priority, and ensuring efficient image and video delivery to improve LCP.

issues.title: Blank Product Image Placeholders in 'New Arrivals'
issues.description: Multiple product images in the 'Women New Arrivals' and 'Men New Arrivals' sections are not loading, appearing as blank white rectangles. This prevents users from visually identifying products, significantly impacting the browsing experience and hindering potential conversion.
issues.evidence: Desktop screenshot: In the 'Women New Arrivals' section, all product listing spaces (e.g., at approximately Y=1100px, X=350px) show blank white rectangles where product images should be. The same issue is present in the 'Men New Arrivals' section (e.g., at approximately Y=1500px, X=350px).
issues.recommendation: Verify the image source paths and ensure all product images are correctly uploaded and accessible on the server. Implement robust error handling or fallback images for cases where primary images fail to load.

issues.title: Console Error: Missing or Invalid BOM-COUNTRY for Pakistan
issues.description: The console shows multiple recurring errors stating '[BOM-COUNTRY]: Missing or invalid bomCountry ('PK')'. This indicates a functional issue with handling country-specific data for Pakistan, which could lead to incorrect pricing, localized content, shipping options, or other regional functionalities.
issues.evidence: Console errors: desktop: [error] [BOM-COUNTRY]: Missing or invalid bomCountry ('PK') (repeated 4 times)
issues.recommendation: Investigate the backend system or frontend script responsible for setting and retrieving the `bomCountry` parameter. Ensure that the 'PK' (Pakistan) country code is correctly supported and processed within the website's localization and e-commerce logic.

summary.primary_concern: Blank Product Image Placeholders in 'New Arrivals'

issues.title: Text Content Cut Off in Location Selection Modal (Mobile)
issues.description: On the mobile homepage, within the 'Where are we shipping to?' modal, the descriptive text 'Shipping from the United States will ensure your best delivery options for your region.' is visibly truncated at the bottom. This impacts readability and user comprehension.
issues.evidence: Mobile screenshot: The text 'Shipping from the United States will ensure...' below the 'United States' dropdown in the modal is visibly cut off at its bottom edge.
issues.recommendation: Adjust the vertical padding or increase the minimum height of the modal content area on mobile to ensure all text is fully visible and legible.

issues.title: Cramped Vertical Spacing in Location Selection Modal (Desktop)
issues.description: On the desktop homepage, the 'Where are we shipping to?' modal exhibits cramped vertical spacing. The descriptive text 'Shipping from the United States will ensure your best delivery options for your region.' is positioned very close to the bottom border of the input field above it, and the 'CONFIRM' button is placed extremely close to the modal's bottom edge. This creates a visually dense and potentially uninviting appearance.
issues.evidence: Desktop screenshot: The 'Where are we shipping to?' modal shows minimal vertical space between the descriptive text, the dropdown input, and the 'CONFIRM' button from the modal's bottom border.
issues.recommendation: Increase the vertical padding or margins within the modal to provide more breathing room between elements, enhancing visual comfort and readability.

issues.title: Content Security Policy (CSP) frame-ancestors Violation (Desktop)
issues.description: The desktop console log contains an error indicating a Content Security Policy (CSP) violation. Specifically, 'Framing 'https://shop.app/' violates the following report-only Content Security Policy directive: "frame-ancestors 'self' https://shop.app https://admin.shopify.com"'. While reported as 'report-only', this error indicates an attempt to frame shop.app that triggers the CSP, which could signify a misconfiguration or a security concern if not intended, or could lead to functional issues if the policy were to be enforced.
issues.evidence: desktop: [error] Framing 'https://shop.app/' violates the following report-only Content Security Policy directive: "frame-ancestors 'self' https://shop.app https://admin.shopify.com". The violation has been logged, bu
issues.recommendation: Investigate the source of the attempt to frame 'https://shop.app/'. If this framing is intentional and legitimate, adjust the Content Security Policy to explicitly allow it without triggering an error. If unintended, address the script or element responsible for the framing to prevent it.

ctas.text: What are you looking for today?

issues.title: Slow Desktop Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)
issues.description: The Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) for desktop is 2756ms, which exceeds the recommended threshold of 2500ms. This indicates a slow loading experience for the primary content visible above the fold, potentially leading to user frustration and higher bounce rates.
issues.recommendation: Optimize image and video assets, prioritize critical resources for loading, implement lazy loading for offscreen content, and investigate server response time (TTFB: 1522ms) for potential improvements.

issues.title: Multiple Broken Images Detected
issues.description: The DOM analysis identified 10 broken images on both the desktop and mobile versions of the homepage. Broken images degrade the user experience, can lead to missing product information, and negatively impact the store's credibility and professionalism.
issues.evidence: Broken images: 10 (present in both DESKTOP DOM and MOBILE DOM analysis)
issues.recommendation: Conduct a comprehensive audit of all image assets on the homepage. Correct or replace any broken image URLs (src attributes) to ensure all visual content loads successfully.

issues.title: Critical JavaScript TypeError in DynamicYield Script on Mobile
issues.description: A `DynamicYield undefined TypeError: Cannot set properties of undefined (setting 'recommendationContext')` error is present in the mobile console log. This indicates a critical JavaScript error affecting a third-party personalization or recommendation script, which could lead to non-functional or incorrect display of recommended products or personalized content.
issues.evidence: mobile: [error] DynamicYield undefined TypeError: Cannot set properties of undefined (setting 'recommendationContext')
issues.recommendation: Debug and resolve the TypeError within the DynamicYield script. Verify the correct initialization and context settings for the DynamicYield library to ensure personalization and recommendation features function as intended on mobile devices.

summary.primary_concern: Slow Desktop LCP, Multiple Broken Images, and Critical JavaScript TypeError
